headline: Cognizant Technology Solutions Corporation (CTSH) Rebounded from Challenges
summary: Pzena Investment Management recently released its fourth-quarter 2025 commentary for “Pzena Focused Value Strategy.” A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fourth quarter was defined by strong AI momentum and continued market dominance by mega-cap stocks.
